operations.body: Implemented platform-aware next-step messaging in tools/configure.py. ESP32 keeps ESP-IDF guidance, AVR/PIC gets AVR-specific guidance, and other platforms get generic guidance. Verified with runs for esp32-c3-supermini, nucleo_f401re, and arduino_uno_r3; evidence in tmp/acceptance/v0.1.0/2026-02-09/artifacts/scrum53/*.out.
